personalInfo.name: Nithin Sunkad
personalInfo.title: Software Developer
personalInfo.summary: Results-driven .NET Developer with 2.5+ years of experience designing, developing, and maintaining enterprise web applications using .NET Core, C#, REST APIs, and modern backend technologies. Proven ability to upgrade legacy systems, debug complex issues, and deliver reliable, scalable software solutions. Passionate about clean code, problem-solving, and continuous learning in dynamic development environments.

experience.company: Sharp Software Development India Pvt. Ltd.
description: Developed and enhanced Sharp OSA SDK and Sharp OSA Simulator, key components for multifunction printer integration.
Upgraded Sharp OSA Simulator from .NET 6 → .NET 8, improving runtime performance and compatibility.
Designed and implemented RESTful and SOAP API integrations to enhance system interoperability.
Collaborated with QA engineers and regularly interacted with clients to understand requirements, provide updates, and demonstrate new feature implementations.
Wrote and maintained unit tests using XUnit for backend modules to ensure code reliability and reduce production defects.
Contributed to the Cocoro-Office (NAS) project using Node.js, upgrading deprecated libraries (Request → Axios) and implementing Jest test coverage.
Authored detailed technical documentation for APIs and internal integrations.
Supported integration and testing of APIs to ensure seamless interoperability and system reliability.

projects.title: Sharp OSA (Open System Architecture)
projects.description: Built and maintained SDK for multifunction printers; upgraded simulator to .NET 8; integrated REST & SOAP APIs; implemented database optimizations; developed unit test suites.

projects.title: Cocoro Office (NAS Project)
projects.description: Migrated from deprecated Request library to Axios; developed new API endpoints; added Jest test coverage; improved maintainability and API response efficiency.

projects.title: Emotion-Based Music Player (Academic Project)
projects.description: Built a real-time emotion recognition system to play music based on detected facial expressions with 88% accuracy.

certifications: Data Structures & Algorithms with Python — Udemy (01/2022)
